plot: Former Secretary of Defense Dick Cheney, the Republican nominee, and Senator Joseph Lieberman, the Democratic nominee, participate in a vice presidential debate for the 2000 election.
title: 2000 Vice Presidential Debate
plot_es: Former Secretary of Defense Dick Cheney, the Republican nominee, and Senator Joseph Lieberman, the Democratic nominee, participate in a vice presidential debate for the 2000 election.
plot_en: Former Secretary of Defense Dick Cheney, the Republican nominee, and Senator Joseph Lieberman, the Democratic nominee, participate in a vice presidential debate for the 2000 election.
